about_description: Monster Word Lab is an AI-powered educational studio that generates high-quality visual learning aids for children.
about_languages_desc: We support English, Spanish, and French to help children learn vocabulary in different languages.
about_age_desc: Every sentence and image is tailored to be safe and suitable for your child's specific age group.
about_process_desc: We combine science and art to make learning fun and effective!
about_process_sentence_desc: Sentences are specifically generated to help your child learn how to read.
about_process_art_desc: Captivating art is created for every word to keep kids engaged and curious.
about_process_speech_desc: Clear voice pronunciation allows children to check their own progress.
about_parent_mode_desc: Full control to enter specific themes and target words for learning.
about_kid_mode_desc: A visual, easy-to-use interface designed for children who are not yet reading.
